name: stacking rings x 3  -  16 gauge sterling silver
description:
3 hammered sterling silver stacking rings.  These rings each have a different texture hammered into them to give them a random varied look on your finger.

Please state your ring size with your order.  If you would like to have the hammered pattern to match on all 3 rings please state as well or you will be shipped different patterns automatically.

name: Double knot ring sterling silver
description:
The double knot ring is hand forged from 18 gauge sterling silver wire.  There are two separate rings tied together at the knots.  The rings come apart except where they are knotted.

What a great way to express your friendship or love with this lovely ring.

You may order 2 "single" knot rings for the price of one "double" (tied together) ring.

Please state size needed in shipping instructions.  Narrow band rings fit loose.  For example if you are normally a size 6 you may need a 5 1/2

name: Earrings sterling silver irregular shape.
description:
Choose from one of two different styles of hammered sterling silver earrings. The multi hoop "mess" or the irregular shaped single hoop.

I make these earrings with sterling silver, I hammer it flat for the designs seen here. I hand forge the earring shanks myself.  All my sterling silver is refined within North America and contains no nickel.

Sterling silver over time will get a tarnish or patina, this is caused by oxidization. I include a small piece of polishing cloth for cleaning your silver with each purchase. I also recommend you not wear your silver in the shower or when using house hold cleaning products as this may also affect the finish of your jewellery. Storing your sterling silver inside plastic zipper type baggies will also prevent tarnishing.

name: Bracelet, chainmaille sterling silver choose one
description:
I have 2 different bracelet shown here, so you get to choose one.  The smaller one is price the same as the larger one as it took longer to make.

The smaller bracelet is made from lighter 20 gauge sterling silver wire interlinked and soldered 20 centimetres long and 1 centimetre wide.  The fob is hand made and marked 925 for sterling silver. 

The second larger bracelet is 21 centimetres long and 2 centimetres wide, I have hammered texture into the rings of the larger bracelet.

name: Sterling silver hammered bubble necklace
description: 44 inches long and is made from hammered sterling silver.  The necklace is designed to hang 2 different ways, long with the large bubbles coming cascading down each side, or double the chain and hold with a clasp so that the bubbles overlap in the front.  Double the bubble fun!
